subject: Officiating (Sports)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Atalanta will start the Serie A season with a 6-point penalty for its role in the latest Italian match-fixing scandal, and its captain, Cristiano Doni, has been barred for three and a half years.
snippet: Atalanta will start the Serie A season with a 6-point penalty for its role in the latest Italian match-fixing scandal, and its captain, Cristiano Doni, has been barred for three and a half years.
